about.article: I am a junior front-end developer with a passion for creating interactive and user-friendly websites. My solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript allows me to build websites with elegant design and smooth functionality. However, I constantly strive to improve and adapt to new trends and technologies. Beyond technical skills, I am also familiar with the basics of UX/UI design. I have a deep respect for users and their needs, and therefore, I always aim to create websites that are intuitive and easy to use.

resume.school: Upper Secondary Technical School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Ostrava
